pageContext.claim: “But the bottom line, the American dream -- the great American dream versus being a socialist hellhole, because they're going to turn us into a socialist nation. We're going to be no different than Venezuela.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a nonsense fear tactic. Trump's claim originates with the Democrats who have embraced some socialist policies. While Venezuela is governed by socialist leaders, its status as an increasingly failed state follows years of dictatorship and economic mismanagement, not simply a few socialist policies.
